name: UBoxComponent
doc: A box generally used for simple collision. Bounds are rendered as lines in the editor.

BoxExtent: The extents (radii dimensions) of the box *

methods.name: GetScaledBoxExtent
methods.doc: @return the box extent, scaled by the component scale.

methods.name: GetUnscaledBoxExtent
methods.doc: @return the box extent, ignoring component scale.

methods.name: SetBoxExtent
